nodes.text: Star Wars Math: Jabba's Game Galaxy

Star Wars Math: Jabba's Game Galaxy is an educational game released by Lucas Learning in 2000. It was intended for children ages 6 and up, and included a number of math games played against Jabba the Hutt and Tatooine characters from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
This is one of only two games (the other is Star Wars: Rebel Assault) that show an asteroid field around Tatooine.
